headers.value: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co wss://*.supabase.co https://*.railway.app https://*.up.railway.app; script-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.supabase.co; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'
